titleStmt.title: Epitaphium honorabilis & prudentissimi viri, domini Johannis Warneri celeberrimæ Reipublicæ Londinensis prætoris, patris patriæ optimi, in ipso exitu magistratûs, anno Christi 1648 nocte præcedente diem 28 Octobris, piè mortui, & 16 Novembris solemniter sepulti.
titleStmt.author: Sictor, Jan, 1593-1652.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Joh. Sictor, exul Bohemus.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
